PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. fwhm (full width at half-maximum)
2. PCDSeBT (polycrystalline cadmium selenide-based bulk heterojunction)
3. PDCTBT (polycrystalline cadmium telluride-based bulk heterojunction)
4. J SC (current-voltage characteristic)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. fwhm (full width at half-maximum)
2. PCDSeBT (polycrystalline cadmium selenide-based bulk heterojunction)
3. PDCTBT (polycrystalline cadmium telluride-based bulk heterojunction)

The entity "J SC" (current-voltage characteristic) is not a material property, so it can be removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| fwhm |
| PCDSeBT |
| PDCTBT |

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:
